Title: AI-Powered Personalized Recipe Generation from Image & Voice Input
Problem Statement: Develop a system that generates personalized recipes based on user-provided images of available ingredients (Vision AI) and voice commands specifying dietary restrictions or preferred cuisine (Voice AI). This caters to users seeking efficient meal planning and minimizes food waste. The system should prioritize ingredients identified in the image and adapt recipes accordingly, offering substitutions when necessary.
Description: This project combines computer vision for ingredient identification with natural language processing to understand dietary preferences. It will require a dataset of recipes, ingredient images, and voice command examples. The system will leverage generative AI to create novel recipe variations.
Deliverables: A functional mobile application (Android/iOS) demonstrating real-time ingredient identification via camera, voice command interpretation, and personalized recipe generation. Include a REST API for recipe retrieval and generation.
Prerequisites: Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Computer Vision, NLP, Mobile Development (Android/iOS)
Infrastructure Requirements: Standard workstation with GPU, access to cloud services for model training (optional)
Value Proposition: Commercial PoC potential for Samsung's SmartThings ecosystem (food management, automated grocery lists)
Novel research in multi-modal recipe generation
Potential patent filing for the recipe adaptation algorithm

Milestones.M2: Functional image recognition module (ingredient identification accuracy >= 70%)
Milestones.M4: Voice command processing and intent recognition integrated.
Milestones.M6: End-to-end recipe generation and application deployment.

Title: On-Device Fall Detection and Emergency Response System
Problem Statement: Develop an on-device (smartphone) AI-powered system for reliable fall detection, specifically targeting elderly or vulnerable individuals (On-device AI, Vision AI). The system should analyze accelerometer and gyroscope data in conjunction with optional camera input to distinguish falls from normal activities.
Description: This project combines sensor fusion with machine learning to create a robust fall detection model. Camera input can be used to confirm a fall and provide contextual information. The system will prioritize privacy by processing data locally on the device.
Deliverables: A functional Android/iOS application demonstrating real-time fall detection and automated emergency contact notification (SMS/call).
Prerequisites: Python, TensorFlow Lite, Sensor Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Mobile Development (Android/iOS)
Infrastructure Requirements: Standard workstation, access to sensor data datasets
Value Proposition: Commercial PoC potential for Samsung Health/Wearables
Viable patent filing for the fall detection algorithm
Addresses a critical healthcare need, particularly for aging populations

Milestones.M2: Functional sensor data processing and feature extraction.
Milestones.M4: Trained fall detection model integrated into the application.
Milestones.M6: End-to-end application deployment with emergency contact integration.

Title: AI-Powered Noise Cancellation & Voice Enhancement for Mobile Calls
Problem Statement: Develop an on-device AI-powered noise cancellation and voice enhancement system for mobile calls (Voice AI, On-device AI). The system should effectively suppress background noise and enhance the speaker's voice in real-time, improving call quality in noisy environments.
Description: This project leverages deep learning to separate speech from noise. The system will prioritize low latency and minimal processing power to ensure real-time performance on mobile devices. The system will also attempt to differentiate between desirable background sounds (e.g., music) and undesirable noise.
Deliverables: A functional Android application demonstrating real-time noise cancellation and voice enhancement during phone calls. Provide metrics on noise reduction and speech intelligibility.
KPIs: Noise reduction level (15dB+ reduction in SNR)
Prerequisites: Python, TensorFlow Lite, Signal Processing, Machine Learning, Mobile Development (Android)
Infrastructure Requirements: Standard workstation with audio interface, access to noise and speech datasets
Value Proposition: Commercial PoC potential for Samsung's communication devices
Viable patent filing for the noise cancellation algorithm
Enhances user experience in mobile communication

Milestones.M2: Functional signal processing and feature extraction pipeline.
Milestones.M4: Trained noise cancellation model integrated into the application.
Milestones.M6: End-to-end application deployment and performance evaluation.

Title: Smart Plant Health Monitoring Using Image Analysis
Problem Statement: Develop a system that uses computer vision (Vision AI) to analyze images of plants captured through a smartphone camera, identifying signs of disease, nutrient deficiencies, or pest infestations. The system will provide recommendations for treatment or preventative measures.
Description: This project combines image processing with machine learning to identify plant diseases and deficiencies. The system will require a dataset of plant images with labeled diseases/deficiencies. The solution should include a user-friendly mobile application for image capture and analysis.
Deliverables: A functional mobile application (Android/iOS) that can identify plant diseases/deficiencies from images and provide recommendations.
Prerequisites: Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Mobile Development (Android/iOS)
Infrastructure Requirements: Standard workstation with GPU, access to plant image datasets
Value Proposition: Commercial PoC potential for Samsung's SmartThings ecosystem (smart gardening)
Viable patent filing for the plant health analysis algorithm
Addresses a growing interest in home gardening and plant care

Milestones.M2: Functional image processing and feature extraction module.
Milestones.M4: Trained plant health analysis model integrated into the application.
Milestones.M6: End-to-end application deployment and user testing.

Reference Work.title: UAV-for-Crop-Health-Analysis
Reference Work.description: UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicles) can be made capable of providing a health monitoring system for plants. High end cameras gives deep insights whether it is surveillance or any broadcast of events (filming and production). The key benefits of crop analysis includes identifying for plant diseases and crop health by inspecting its colour components. This is done by studying Near Infrared and Multi-Spectral Cameras which help us in obtaining the Red, Green, Blue and Infrared components of a plant and with the help of computer vision. With computer aided image processing. The processing of the video feed captured by a NoIR camera is done with the help of an on-board micro-computer. Additionally autonomous flight, safety failsafe for landing when on low power, mission planning etc. are some of the facilities that can be incorporated in such a UAV to provide a full integrated crop monitoring and analysis system.

Title: AI-Driven Personalized Music Recommendation from Ambient Sound
Problem Statement: Develop a system that analyzes ambient sound (using a smartphone's microphone) and generates personalized music recommendations based on the detected environment and mood (Voice AI, Generative AI). For instance, a calm environment might suggest classical music, while a bustling city could suggest upbeat electronic music.
Description: This project combines audio analysis with machine learning and generative AI. The system needs to classify ambient sound, infer the user's mood, and then recommend music based on these factors. It also uses a generative AI model to customize/generate music based on inferred context.
Deliverables: A functional mobile application (Android/iOS) that analyzes ambient sound and provides personalized music recommendations. Include an API for accessing a music streaming service.
KPIs: User satisfaction with music recommendations (4+ star rating)
Prerequisites: Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Audio Signal Processing, Machine Learning, Mobile Development (Android/iOS)
Infrastructure Requirements: Standard workstation with audio interface, access to music datasets
Value Proposition: Commercial PoC potential for Samsung Music/SmartThings ecosystem
Viable patent filing for the mood-based music recommendation algorithm
Offers a unique and personalized music listening experience

Milestones.M2: Functional audio analysis and feature extraction module.
Milestones.M4: Trained mood classification and music recommendation models.
Milestones.M6: End-to-end application deployment and user testing.
